article.headline: Bethune-Cookman 60, Winston-Salem 50
article.story: WINSTON-SALEM, N.C. (AP) -- Dewayne Pettus scored a career-high 26 points to lead Bethune-Cookman to a 60-50 victory over Winston-Salem on Monday night. Joey Woods scored 10 of his 12 points in the second half for the Wildcats (9-13), and Dominique Whatley scored 10 points. Jamal Durham led Winston-Salem (8-12) with 12 points, and Darrell Wonge had 10. Bethune-Cookman led 27-26 at halftime, but widened their lead in the second half with the help of free throws, hitting 10 of 14 for 71 percent. The Rams went cold at the line, making just 1 of 5 for 20 percent.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
